content.p: First, there was a decision. Then a dream came true. What do Harry Potter books, a library and a ministerial visit have in common? Watch and find out. The Dean of NUBS shares on a humble beginning that has since grown in leaps and bounds. Friendships made with an international community of staff without having met face-to-face. We have come a long way since the early years. Find out what it was like for our Dean of Faculty of Engineering when he was 15 years old. Find out what it was like for our Dean of Faculty of Science when she was 15 years old. Find out what it was like for our Dean of Faculty of Arts and Social Sciences when she was 15 years old. Jalan Broga, 43500 Semenyih Selangor Darul Ehsan Malaysia THE UNIVERSITY OF NOTTINGHAM IN MALAYSIA SDN. BHD. DULN001(B) (473520-K) telephone: +6 (03) 8924 8000 fax: +6 (03) 8924 8001
